name: Rainbow Match - The funny colored match3 game - Free
name_original: Rainbow Match - The funny colored match3 game - Free
description:
The new no. 1 top app from the USA!
Beat the high scores and challenge yourself!
This app is fully loaded with levels, fun and of course a great gameplay!

A new ingenious Casual Swap 3 game. Can you get all the diamonds? This classic saga game is completely filled with lots levels with big fun! Get it now! Change the colors and try this casual game now.
Yes, it is Free!
